channel.title: What Were They Really Doing At Black Mesa?
channel.description:
title pretty much says it all, but what im confused about is, they were testing theses alien gem things, but they were also launching satellites into space?? what does that have to do with anything? im confused about that whole thing here.
so what exactly were they really doing at Black Mesa Research Facility?
p.s if theres already a thread like this, sorry, the search function never gives me any results

item.title: What Were They Really Doing At Black Mesa?

item.description:
I thnik they just blow stuff up and killed scientists for fun! D=<

Read full topic

item.title: What Were They Really Doing At Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: Kisuke_Moto
item.description:
A research facility in New Mexico somewhere, where they did test on new tech such as Telepathic tech and newer weapons such as the gauss gun, egon, Sporelauncher and Displacer (Opposing Force Concluded).

Read full topic

item.title: What Were They Really Doing At Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: rorriMAesU
item.description:
In the original HL you had to launch a satellite in order to fix everything. There really isn’t anything to speculate or question. All known research that was going on at BM during HL has been mentioned in this thread:

Ham Solo:

Portal technology, rocket science, studies of extraterrestrial life forms, experimental weapons…

rorriMAesU:

…Ham Solo pretty much summed it up, but perhaps we can also include communications research due to the satellite launch?..

If anyone is looking for technical details on how all of this works, you may as well make it up yourself because its science FICTION. Some of you people really need to go outside and get a life. lol

Read full topic
item.source: What Were They Really Doing At Black Mesa?

item.title: What Were They Really Doing At Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: MarshmallowRadiation
item.description:
I think the satellites were used to somehow direct and control the portals to Xen.

In Episode 2, they use “the old array they set up at Black Mesa” to shut down the Combine superportal, remember?

item.title: What Were They Really Doing At Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: rorriMAesU
item.description:
SwampFox56:

…I mean what kind of portal technology are we talking about here?

rorriMAesU:

Dude, HL is a video game, its not real life…don’t think about it too hard. Besides, its not like there is some correct answer.

SwampFox56:

no shit sherlock

Don’t like my answer? Don’t ask stupid questions than. lol

What kind of answer are you really looking for anyway? Any answer is speculation.

Read full topic

item.title: What Were They Really Doing At Black Mesa?

item.description:
xiiliea:

So perhaps Gordon has been sleepwalking for 20 years? And finally waking up.

Nah, he felt asleep in the freezer after trying to get a snack.

item.source: What Were They Really Doing At Black Mesa?

item.title: What Were They Really Doing At Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: xiiliea
item.description:
Soviet:

Further proof, it’s pretty common for a person to place something they’ve seen in reality into their subconscious when they lose control of their sanity. In fact, typically it is something either coinciding with or very close in proximity to the incident, something they might be able to associate it with.

So perhaps Gordon has been sleepwalking for 20 years? And finally waking up.

Read full topic
item.source: What Were They Really Doing At Black Mesa?

item.title: What Were They Really Doing At Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: Soviet
item.description:
Dias:

But you can see him on the tram before the incident.

Further proof, it’s pretty common for a person to place something they’ve seen in reality into their subconscious when they lose control of their sanity. In fact, typically it is something either coinciding with or very close in proximity to the incident, something they might be able to associate it with.

Read full topic
